name: The Last Hike
description:
The Last Hike - is an excellent 2D adventure game, with elements of survival, in which you need to resist the ancient evil, playing as a knight named Richard.
In this game you can engage in various types of crafts, ranging from hunting animals and ending with orders for bloodthirsty monsters.
As you have already understood, there is no specific plot in this game, you can do what you like best. Namely: go through various quests, explore new locations, kill monsters, and thus get closer and closer to the final of this game. Upgrade your character, sell items, earn yourself the best equipment and be sure this game will leave an unforgettable impression!

Key Features:
- Simple gameplay.
- Pixel graphics.
- Linear plot.
- Various locations and enemies.
- Unforgettable adventures.
